name: Cyber Ball (Steane)
description:
Game looks a lot better as a downloadable executable. Bloom and exposure did not translate across to the web build. Please try the executable if you have the time. Fullscreen required in browser version.

Click and drag the ball to fire it in a direction. You only have one shot.

Only 5 levels currently

Credit for the music used:

Artist: Movie Music
Song: Cyber Punk, Scifi, Pop Song
Download/Stream: https://audiograb.com/113rTdgm
